title: Play Safe
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board, Australian Road Safety Council and Video Films
brief_description: Aimed at children, this film highlights a number of road safety aspects. Don Bradman talks to the children about avoiding accidents, both going and coming from school, and during playtime on the school playground.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian National Film Board, Australian Road Safety Council and Video Films
